General.Name: Maskapai Reasuransi Indonesia
General.Description: PT Maskapai Reasuransi Indonesia Tbk engages in the reinsurance business in Indonesia. The company offers general reinsurance products, such as property, motor vehicle, marine hull and cargo, aviation, health, liability, personal accident, suretyship, and engineering reinsurance, as well as energy, and oil and gas reinsurance. It also provides life reinsurance, including term life, personal accident, financing life, credit life, critical illness, health, and catastrophe reinsurance products, as well as Sharia life and general reinsurance products. The company was founded in 1953 and is based in South Jakarta, Indonesia.
